instruction: Use the dataset to make sentiment predictions on test.csv. Write the predicted labels ("Negative", "Positive") into result.csv as per the provided template.

Predict the sentiment of the comments in test.csv. Save your prediction results into sentiment.csv, using the column name 'emotion' to represent the sentiment.

Predict whether individuals in test.csv will have a stroke based on the Stroke Prediction dataset. Save your predictions in stroke.csv with the column name "stroke".
Predict whether mushrooms in test.csv are poisonous based on the Mushroom dataset. Save your predictions in class.csv with the column name "class".

You are tasked with designing a method to predict the Response variable using the Health Insurance Cross Sell dataset. Predict the responses for entries in test.csv and save the results in submission.csv, ensuring they follow the format provided in sample_submission.csv.
